entry.title: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 11:52AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Bitterly Cold Start to the Week... .Arctic air will persist early this week with wind chills ranging from 20 below to 35 below zero. With some daytime temperature increase, wind chills may not be quite as low across parts of Wisconsin during the afternoon hours, but overall, much of this week will be quite cold.
